name: Star Butterfly
info:
• 简体中文名: 星蝶
  • 别名: Star
  • 别名: 星星蝶舞
  • 别名: 小星
  • 性别: 女
  • 引用来源: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Star_vs._the_Forces_of_Evil
detail: Star, 14, is a fun-loving optimist who never wants to have a dull day. She’s fascinated by the world around her and wants to explore as much of it as possible. On Mewni, Star’s parents put pressure on her to be the perfect princess, but on Earth she has freedom to live by her own rules… just as long as her parents don’t find out about it.
